data.title: University of Maine at Farmington
data.meta_description: The UMF Community remembers these beloved alumni and friends who have passed since January 1, 2022 (for previous years, click here). Obituaries are listed in chronological order by class year. If you know of the passing of other alumni and friends, please share the obituaries with UMF's Ferro Alumni Center…
data.text:
The UMF Community remembers these beloved alumni and friends who have passed since January 1, 2022 (for previous years, click here). Obituaries are listed in chronological order by class year. If you know of the passing of other alumni and friends, please share the obituaries with UMF’s Ferro Alumni Center at umfalumni@maine.edu.
